Constructor Detail

PostClient

public PostClient(String serviceAddress)

PostClient

public PostClient(String serviceAddress,
                  String version,
                  boolean useAuthCode,
                  PostListener defaultListener)
Create a new PostClient for processing RPC calls to the Java server.

Parameters:
serviceAddress - The fully qualified HTTP address to connect to the server at.
version - The version string to send along with RPC requests. If this version is null an error will be thrown on the server unless the server is also configured with a null version.
Method Detail

shutdown

public void shutdown(boolean allowQueueToComplete)
Shuts down the PostClient. Any service requests made after shutdown will fail immediately.

Parameters:
allowQueueToComplete - if true, allows the queue of pending service requests to continue processing.

registerService

public <T extends PostService> void registerService(Class<T> clazz,
                                                    T marshaller)
Configure a service marshaller.

Parameters:
clazz - The service class that the marshaller implements. The service class should be an extension of PostService.
marshaller - The class that implements the given server.

setAuthCode

public void setAuthCode(String authCode)
Set the auth code to send with each request, if this PostClient was configured to use it in the constrcutor.

Parameters:
authCode - The auth code to send

getService

public <T extends PostService> T getService(Class<T> clazz)
Get the implementor of the given service.

requireService

public <T extends PostService> T requireService(Class<T> clazz)
Get the implementor of the given service.

Throws:
Error - if the service has not been registered with this client.

sendRequest

public void sendRequest(int serviceId,
                        int methodId,
                        Object[] args)
This method should only be called by subclasses of PostMarshaller.
